body_html: @hsgkim 1. That should be a new kernel under a core/kernels directory. 2. It would be nice to have api consistent with image patches, though I’m not sure how important to have rates for volume patches. It seems that omitting parameter from the kernel and using default value of 1 for row/col rates is ok. Rates can be added later and it should be backward compatible.

body: @hsgkim 1. That should be a new kernel under a core/kernels directory. 2. It would be nice to have api consistent with image patches, though I’m not sure how important to have rates for volume patches. It seems that omitting parameter from the kernel and using default value of 1 for row/col rates is ok. Rates can be added later and it should be backward compatible.
